description:
Hazel Strauch is a PreK-6th grade elementary school that serves approximately 700 students. Our mission is to provide all students with a high-quality instructional program
within a safe and orderly environment where all students will reach their maximum
potential both socially and academically.

We take pride in having a strong home-to-school partnership, recognizing parents and
families are crucial to our success. We aim to develop long-term partnerships with our
parents and community through consistent, open, and clear communication. This allows
us to work together to provide support and resources to best meet the needs of our
students. Our success directly reflects the partnerships established among the students,
staff, and community.Â
